definition: a kind of gun emplacement, gather nests
details:
noun
- a kind of gun emplacement
= example: a kind of gun emplacement
- furniture pieces made to fit close together
- a gang of people (criminals or spies or terrorists) assembled in one locality
= example: a gang of people (criminals or spies or terrorists) assembled in one locality
- a cosy or secluded retreat
- a structure in which animals lay eggs or give birth to their young
verb
- gather nests
- move or arrange oneself in a comfortable and cozy position
= synonyms: cuddle
- fit together or fit inside
= example: fit together or fit inside
- inhabit a nest, usually after building
= example: inhabit a nest, usually after building
